comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.5.0 to 15.5.1
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.5.0 to 15.5.1.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.5.1

Patch Changes

  • #1533 5d53534 Thanks @​iiroj! - Improve listing of staged files so that lint-staged doesn't crash when encountering an uninitialized submodule. This should result in less errors like:

    ✖ Failed to get staged files!
Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.5.1

Patch Changes

  • #1533 5d53534 Thanks @​iiroj! - Improve listing of staged files so that lint-staged doesn't crash when encountering an uninitialized submodule. This should result in less errors like:

    ✖ Failed to get staged files!
Commits
  • 6a73e5b chore(changeset): release
  • cf7f1a5 Merge pull request #1533 from lint-staged/fix-submodules-filter
  • 6acd5bf ci: bump Cygwin action v5
  • 5d53534 fix: handle uninitialized submodules when listing staged files
  • ccf8fa5 docs(package): fix repository url and bin; add homepage and bugs urls (#1532)
  • See full diff in compare view

You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: www.gutefrage.net

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
It took less than 24 hours before the previous fix attempt by Team AdGuard no longer worked, so the report immediately above (The one that lists Adobe Acrobat as another extension) should indicate the need for a much less narrow entry (albeit one that avoids Pixiv's noticeably different phone UI).

I thus propose:
```
!#if !env_mobile
!#if !adguard_app_android
!#if !adguard_app_ios
pixiv.net##li.list-none.col-span-4:has([id^=adsdk])
!#endif
!#endif
!#endif
```

comment.body:
Hola @war-pe
Este script crea una ventana emergente con un enlace que lleva a un sitio externo para descargar una aplicación de terceros, así que en mi opinión, esto es publicidad. Bloqueamos cualquier tipo de publicidad, incluso la de servicios seguros y útiles, por lo tanto, he decidido bloquear este script.

This script creates a popup with a link that leads to an external site to download a third-party application, so in my opinion, this is advertising. We block all kinds of advertising, including ads for safe and useful services, so I have decided to block this script.

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.5.0 to 15.5.1
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.5.0 to 15.5.1.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.5.1

Patch Changes

  • #1533 5d53534 Thanks @​iiroj! - Improve listing of staged files so that lint-staged doesn't crash when encountering an uninitialized submodule. This should result in less errors like:

    ✖ Failed to get staged files!
Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.5.1

Patch Changes

  • #1533 5d53534 Thanks @​iiroj! - Improve listing of staged files so that lint-staged doesn't crash when encountering an uninitialized submodule. This should result in less errors like:

    ✖ Failed to get staged files!
Commits
  • 6a73e5b chore(changeset): release
  • cf7f1a5 Merge pull request #1533 from lint-staged/fix-submodules-filter
  • 6acd5bf ci: bump Cygwin action v5
  • 5d53534 fix: handle uninitialized submodules when listing staged files
  • ccf8fa5 docs(package): fix repository url and bin; add homepage and bugs urls (#1532)
  • See full diff in compare view

issue.body:
Documentation domain

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\

## Prerequisites

> Adguard Chrome browser extension allowing sponsored posts /pads all over Facebook.com.

The failure has been persistent for several days now

@wittier As I see, the rule for this site was updated yesterday. But Google forbids filters update. Please check for extension update later (+2-3 days)
I don't see any other locales there. Please move it to the Dutch filter.
Is it needed to omit the `div` tag for `.newsletter`? If not, please add it.

AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version AdGuard AdBlocker MV2 5.1.70 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below) ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.facebook.com/watch ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard Turkish filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots * Brave Browser v1.77.97 Chromium: 135.0.7049.84 (Official Build) (64-bit) * AdGuard Extra v1.0.676 1. So, AdGuard filter maintainers can't reproduce this ad issue? Is it some kind of A/B testing or something? 🤔 2. * Related issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/200280#issuecomment-2759498159 - Another user has the same issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/200280#issuecomment-2777104880

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5ee5b9bf-f71a-4dc2-aed6-7e4cca81f3e0

Currently I cannot reproduce sidebar ads even without AdGuard.
I will update rule when I will be able to reproduce it.

comment.body:
The AdGuard Annoyances filter and other annoyances filters also block subscription forms, so this is an expected result. If this site had more than 100,000 visits per month, then these leftovers should be blocked, but this website has too little traffic to add a separate rules for it.
Please add to user rules to unblock the form: `@@||forms.aweber.com^$domain=derdirigent.at`

review.body:
Copilot reviewed 2 out of 2 changed files in this pull request and generated no comments.


<details>
<summary>Comments suppressed due to low confidence (2)</summary>

**SpywareFilter/sections/specific.txt:86**
* The analytics rule appears to target all endpoints under '/coveo/rest/*/analytics/' but the issue description focuses on '/analytics/searches?'. Consider refining this rule to specifically cover the intended endpoint to avoid unintended matches.
```
||colliers.com/coveo/rest/*/analytics/
```
**AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_allowlist.txt:8**
* Ensure that adding 'colliers.com' to the allowlist for the CDN script is intentional and does not inadvertently permit unwanted cookie behavior. It might also help to maintain a consistent ordering with other domains for improved readability.
```
@@||cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js$domain=hollywoodreporter.com|...|colliers.com
```
</details>

comment.body:
I see that it has been unblocked for `taobao.com` in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/5e9aff75dc4cd67eeb74e7cdee10475f075c4801, so I guess that we can just remove this rule.
I mean that we can remove:
```adblock
||g.alicdn.com/alilog/mlog/aplus_v2.js
```

The only request on my end which is blocked by XHR rule is:
```
https://g.alicdn.com/alilog/??s/8.15.24/plugin/aplus_client.js,aplus_cplugin/0.7.12/toolkit.js,aplus_cplugin/0.7.12/monitor.js,s/8.15.24/plugin/aplus_ws.js,s/8.15.24/aplus_std.js,s/8.15.24/plugin/aplus_spmact.js?v=20250327170802
```
but it looks like that if XHR is blocked then it fall back to `script`, so I'm not sure about blocking XHR.

issue.title: war.pe

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
> @Sergey-Lyapin @Alex-302  Se bloqueó el script war.pe/warp.js, pero este fue creado únicamente para informar a los usuarios que si no tienen Warp activado pueden usarlo de forma gratuita. No contiene trackers ni realiza peticiones externas; solo verifica localmente si hay Warp usando el mismo endpoint de Cloudflare del sitio y muestra un aviso cerrable que solo enlaza a one.one.one.one (página oficial de Cloudflare). El script está alojado en warpe.pages.dev (Cloudflare Pages, solo contenido estático) y el dominio war.pe apunta ahí. El bloqueo afecta una función útil, segura y transparente. Este script no tiene que ver con la situación mostrada en este commit ni con ningún tipo de publicidad, simplemente recomienda al usuario el servicio gratuito de Cloudflare, por favor revisar para considerar revertirlo. 

 _Originally posted by @war-pe in [#202464](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/202464#issuecomment-2796686188)_

comment.body:
Hola @war-pe
Este script crea una ventana emergente con un enlace que lleva a un sitio externo para descargar una aplicación de terceros, así que en mi opinión, esto es publicidad. Bloqueamos cualquier tipo de publicidad, incluso la de servicios seguros y útiles, por lo tanto, he decidido bloquear este script.

This script creates a popup with a link that leads to an external site to download a third-party application, so in my opinion, this is advertising. We block all kinds of advertising, including ads for safe and useful services, so I have decided to block this script.

@@ -51,6 +51,9 @@ gaugau.futabanet.jp,newscientist.com,jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,n
 !
 ! SECTION: Subscriptions - Regular rules
 !
+substack.com##article.newsletter-post > .pencraft
+substack.com##article > div > div.pencraft:has(> div.pencraft > .subscribe-widget)
+substack.com##form.embedded-publication-subscribe
comment.body:
Your rule only removes part of the element, I suggest this:
```suggestion
substack.com##div[data-component-name="EmbeddedPublicationToDOMWithSubscribe"]
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://manhuatop.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmanhuatop.org%2F) ### Comment > 1. Go to [https://manhuatop.org](https://manhuatop.org) > 2. Observe that there's either a floating dialog labeled "Attention" at the middle of the page, or a smaller pseudo-notification at the upper-right corner of the page with an image of a semi-naked lady and text saying something like "I like you!
